fields.name: Breakfall Basics
fields.description: Learn how to safely breakfall backward and sideways.

fields.name: Hip Escape (Shrimp)
fields.description: Fundamental movement for guard retention and escapes.

fields.name: Bridge and Roll Escape (Trap & Roll)
fields.description: Basic mount escape by bridging and rolling your opponent.

fields.name: Guard Pass Fundamentals
fields.description: First pass from closed guard focusing on posture and base.
